data.title: Famous Birthdays on December 18
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 18th of December. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on December 18.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 240

Albert VI, Archduke of Austria, born in Vienna, Austria (d. 1463)

Ōuchi Yoshitaka, Japanese warlord, born in Yamaguchi, Japan (d. 1551)

Philipp Dulichius, German composer, born in Chemnitz, Electorate of Saxony, Holy Roman Empire (d. 1631)

Jakob Hassler, German composer, born in the Free Imperial City of Nuremberg, Holy Roman Empire (d. 1622)

Simonds d'Ewes, English antiquarian and politician (d. 1650)

Adriaen Millaert [Melar], Flemish engraver, baptized at Antwerp (d. 1667)
